Translations.Text: Sada, ya bodha upadesapurna kura'anaci sapatha
Parantu kaphira (inkari loka) ghamenda ani virodhata padale aheta
Amhi yacyapurvihi aneka janasamuhanna nasta karuna takale, tyanni pratyeka prakare arada'orada keli, parantu ti vela sutakeci navhati
Ani kaphira lokanna ya gostibaddala ascarya vatale ki tyancyapaikica eka khabaradara karanara ala ani mhanu lagale ki ha jadugara ani khotarada ahe
Kaya yane evadhya sarya aradhya daivatanna ekaca daivata (mabuda) banavuna takale, kharokhara hi motha vicitra gosta ahe
Tyance saradara (pramukha) ase bolata nighuna ja'u lagale, ja, apalya daivatanvara majabuta (atala) raha. Nihsansaya, ya gostita kahitari uddista (svartha) ahe
Amhi tara hi gosta pracina dharmammadhyehi aikali nahi kahi nahi, hi kevala manane racaleli gosti ahe

Kaya amhi sarvampaiki tyacyavaraca (allahaci) vahayi avatarita keli geli? Vastutah he loka majhya vahayi (prakasana) babata sansayagrasta aheta,1 kimbahuna (kharetara) tyanni majhya siksa yataneci godi adyapa cakhalica nahi
Kaya tyancyajavala, tumacya varcasvasali, bharapura pradana karanarya palanakartyacya krpece khajine aheta
Kinva akasa ani dharati ani tyancya daramyanacya pratyeka gostice rajya tyanceca ahe, ase ahe tara dorya tanuna (akasata) cadhuna jave
Hedekhila (visala) sain'yampaiki parabhuta (lahanase) sain'ya ahe
Tyancya purvihi nuhaca janasamuha ani adaca janasamuha ani khile (mekham) valya phira'aunane khote tharavile hote
Ani samuda va luta janasamuhane ani vanata rahanaryannihi, hica visala sain'ye hoti
Yancyapaiki eka dekhila asa navhata, jyane paigambaranna khote tharavile nasela, tevha majha azaba tyancyavara lagu jhala
Ani tyanna kevala eka tivra (bhayankara) citkaraci pratiksa ahe, jyata kasalahi adathala (ani vilamba) nahi
Ani (te) mhanale ki he amacya palanakartya! Amaca vata tu amhala hisobacya divasapurvica pradana kara
Tumhi tyancya bolanyavara sahanasilata rakha ani amace dasa da'udace smarana kara jo motha saktisali hota, nihsansaya, to (allahakade) motha ruju karanara hota
Amhi parvatanna tyancya adhina kele (tabyata dile) hote ki tyacyasobata sakala sandhyakala allahacya pavitrateca japa (tasbiha) karava
Ani (udanarya) paksannahi ekatra ho'una sarvacya sarva tyacya adhina hote
Amhi tyace rajya majabuta kele hote ani tyala hikamata (bud'dhikausalya) pradana kele hote ani gostica phaisala (sucavila hota)
Ani kaya tumhala bhandana karanaryanci khabara pohocali, jevha te bhinta olanduna meharabamadhye (upasanecya thikani) ale

Jevha te da'udajavala pohocale, tevha te yanna pahuna ghabarale. Te mhanale, bhi'u naka, amaca apasatila tanta ahe. Amacyapaiki ekane dusaryavara atyacara kela ahe, tevha tumhi amacya daramyana n'yayapurvaka phaisala karava ani an'yaya karu naka ani amhala sarala marga dakhava

(Aika!) Ha majha bha'u ahe. Yacyajavala navyannava mendhya aheta. Ani majhyajavala ekaca ahe. Parantu ha mala mhanato ki tujhi ti eka dekhila mala de'una taka ani majhyavara bolanyata motha sakta mamala (vyavahara) karato

(Da'uda) mhanale, tyace apalya mendhyansobata tujhi eka mendhi samila karuna ghenyaca prasna niscitaca tujhyavara atyacara ahe. Ani adhikansa bhagidara ani sahabhagi (aseca asatata ki) ekamekanvara juluma atyacara ani an'yaya karatata, matra tyancyakherija, jyanni imana rakhale ani je satkarma karita rahile, tathapi ase loka pharaca kami aheta ani da'uda (alai.) Yanni januna ghetale ki amhi tyanci pariksa ghetali ahe, maga tara apalya palanakartya (allaha) javala tauba (ksama yacana) karu lagale ani mothya vinamratene khali padale (sajadyata gele) ani (purnapane) ruju jhale
Tevha amhi dekhila tyanci hi (cuka) mapha keli. Nihsansaya, te amacyajavala mothe ucca sthana rakhanare ani sarvanta cangale thikana balaganare aheta

He da'uda! Amhi tumhala dharativara khalipha banavile, tevha tumhi lokancya daramyana n'yayasaha phaisala kara ani apalya manacya iccha akanksance anusarana karu naka, an'yatha ti tumhala allahacya margapasuna hatavila. Nihsansaya, je loka allahacya margapasuna bhatakatata, tyancyasathi sakta azaba (siksa-yatana) ahe. Asasathi ki tyanni hisobacya divasaca visara padala ahe
Ani amhi akasa va dharati ani tyancya daramyanacya vastunna (astitvanna) vyartha (ani akarana) nirmana nahi kele. Hi sanka tara kaphira (inkari) lokanci ahe, tevha kaphirankarita agica vinasa ahe
Kaya amhi tya lokanna, jyanni imana rakhale ani satkarme keli tya lokansamana tharavu je (roja) dharativara utpata (phasada) majavita rahile, kinva neka sadacari lokanna duracaryansarakham banavu
Ha motha subhagrantha ahe, jo amhi tumacyakade asasathi avatarita kela ahe ki lokanni yacya ayatinvara vicara cintana karave ani bud'dhi rakhanaryanni yapasuna bodha grahana karava
Ani amhi da'udala sulaimana (navaca putra) pradana kela. Jo motha uttama dasa hota ani (allahakade) khupa ruju karanara hota
Jevha tyancyasamora sandhyakali vegata calanare khasa ghode sadara kele gele
Tevha mhanale, mi apalya palanakartya (allaha) cya smaranavara ya ghodyacya premala pradhan'ya dile, yetheparyanta ki surya budala
Ya ghodyanna punha majhyasamora ana, maga potaryanvara ani mananvara hata phiravu lagale
Ani amhi sulemanaci kasoti ghetali ani tyancya sinhasanavara eka dhada (mrta sarira) takuna dile, maga te dhyanamagna jhale
Mhanale ki he majhya palanakartya mala ksama kara ani mala ase rajya pradana kara, je majhyakherija konatyahi (manasasa) patra nasave. Tu phara motha data ahesa
Tevha amhi havela tyancya adhina kele. Ti tyancya adesanam, jikade te icchita, naramine pohacavu deta ase
Ani (saktisali) jinnanna dekhila, tyancya adhina (tabe) kele hote ani pratyeka ghara banavinaryala ani panabudyala
Ani itara (jinnanna) dekhila, je srnkhalanni jakhadalele rahata
Ha ahe amaca anugraha, ata tumhi upakara kara kinva rokhuna theva, kahi hisoba nahi
Ani tyancyasathi amacyajavala mothi nikatata ahe, ani phara cangale thikana ahaie
Ani amace dasa ayyubacihi carca kara, jevha tyane apalya palanakartyala pukarale ki mala saitanane duhkha - yatana pohacavili ahe
Apala paya jaminivara mara. He angholice thanda ani pinyace pani ahe
Ani amhi tyala tyace sampurna kutumba pradana kele, kimbahuna tevadheca anakhihi tyasobata apalya khasa krpene, ani bud'dhimanankarita bodhapraptisathi

Ani apalya hatata kadyanca guccha ghe'una tyane mara ani sapatha todu nako.1 Khare tara ase ki amhala to motha sahanasila dasa adhalala. To motha neka sadacari dasa hota ani (allahakade) motha ruju karanara
Ani amace dasa ibrahima, isahaka ani yakuba yancihi (lokammadhye) carca kara je hata ani dole rakhanare hote
Amhi tyanna eka visesa gosta arthata akhiratacya smaranasobata khasaritya sambandhita karuna ghetale hote
Ani he sarva amacyajavala nivadaka ani sarvadhika cangalya lokampaiki hote
Ani isma'ila, yasa'a ani julakiphla yancehi varnana kara. He sarva neka loka hote
Ha upadesa ahe ani visvasa kara ki neka sadacari lokansathi sarvanta uttama sthana ahe
Arthata sadaiva kala rahanari jannata, jyanci dare tyancyasathi khuli aheta
Jyancyata te (mothya cainine) takke lavuna basale asatila. Vegavegalya prakarace meve (phale) ani aneka prakaraci peye magata asatila
Ani tyancyajavala najara khali thevanarya samavayaska hura (parya) asatila
Hica ti gosta jica vayada tumhala hisobacya divasakarita dila jata hota
Nihsansaya, hi ajivika, amaca (visesa) upahara ahe, ji kadhihi sampanara nahi
Ha tara jhala mobadala (laksata theva ki) vidrohi lokankarita mothe va'ita sthana ahe
Jahannama ahe, jyata te dakhala hotila (arere!) Kiti va'ita bichona ahe
He ahe, tyanni te cakhave, garama (ukalate) pani ani pu
Ani kahi itara prakaracya siksa
Ha eka samudaya ahe, jo tumacyasobata (agita) janara ahe. Tyancyasathi kasalihi svagata nahi. Heca jahannamamadhye janara aheta
(Te) mhanatila ki, kimbahuna tumhica te ahata jyancyasathi kasalehi svagata nahi. Tumhica tara yasa adhipasunaca amacyasamora anuna thevale hote. Tevha rahanyace mothe va'ita sthana ahe
(Te) mhanatila ki he amacya palanakartya! Jyane ti (kupraci pratha) amacyasathi sarvanta prathama suru keli asela, tyacyasathi jahannamaci siksa duppata kara
Ani (jahannamavasi) mhanatila ki, he kaya! Amhala te loka disuna yeta nahita, jyanci ganana amhi va'ita lokammadhye karita hoto
Kaya amhica tyanna thatta-maskari banavuna thevale hote ki amace dole tyancyapasuna bahakuna gele aheta
Nihsansaya, jahannamavalyance he bhandana avasya ho'ila
Sanga ki mi tara kevala eka khabaradara karanara ahe ani ekameva jabaradasta allahakherija dusara konihi upasanesa patra nahi
Jo svami va palanakarta ahe akasanca ani dharatica, ani je kahi tyancya daramyana ahe, to motha jabaradasta (mahana) ani motha mapha karanara ahe
Sanga ki hi phara mothi khabara ahe
Ticyapasuna tumhi tonda phiravita ahata
Mala tya ucca padastha pharistyam (cya sambhasana) ce kincitahi jnana nahi, jevha te bhandana karita hote
Majhyakade kevala hica vahayi keli jate ki mi tara spastapane savadha karanara ahe
Jevha tumacya palanakartya (allaha) ne pharistyanna sangitale, mi matipasuna manavala nirmana karanara ahe
Tara jevha mi tyala yathayogya karina ani tyacyata apala atma phunkina, tevha tumhi sarva tyacyasamora sajada kara1 (matha teka)
Tevha sarva pharistyanni sajada kela
Parantu iblisane (kela nahi) tyane ghamenda keli ani to inkara karanaryampaiki hota

(Allahane) pharmavile ki he iblisa! Tyala (adamala) sajada karanyapasuna tula konatya gostine rokhale, jyala mi apalya hatanni banavile, kaya tu garvistha jhala ahesa ki tu ucca darja rakhanaryampaiki ahesa
(Tyane) uttara dile ki mi yacyapeksa adhika srestha ahe, tu mala agipasuna nirmana kele ani yala matipasuna nirmana kele
Pharmavile ki tu yethuna nighuna ja, tu tiraskrta (dhihkkarita) jhala
Ani kayamatacya divasaparyanta tujha majhyatarphe dhihkkara ahe
To mhanala, he majhya svami! Mala tya divasaparyanta savada pradana kara, jevha loka (jivanta karuna) uthavile jatila
(Allahane) pharmavile, tu savada dilya janaryampaiki ahesa
Nirdharita velecya divasaparyanta
Mhanala, maga tara tujhya pratistheci sapatha! Mi ya sarvanna avasya bhatakavina
Matra tujhya tya dasankherija, je nivadaka (ani priya, pavitra) asatila
Pharmavile, satya heca ahe ani mi satyaca sangata asato
Ki mi tujhyadvare ani tujhya sarva anuyayindvare jahannamala bharuna takena
Sanga ki mi yabaddala tumacyakaduna kasalahi mobadala magata nahi ani ani mi banavata karanaryampaiki nahi
Ha tara sarva jagavalyankarita paripurna upadesa ani smarana ahe
Nihsansaya, tumhi yaci vastavikata thodyaca kalanantara (ucitaritya) januna ghyala
